room_title: Escape room "The ClassRoom Adventure" by West Palm Beach Escape Rooms in West Palm Beach
room_address: 209 S. Olive Ave West Palm Beach, FL 33401
room_description:
In 1986 Mrs. Elvira Price disappeared from her high school classroom. She was never seen again, and people believed that her classroom is haunted. The room was closed down after numerous ghost sightings and eerie voices singing at night.
A month ago, the events started unraveling at a scary pace. Again and again, groups of strangers found themselves locked in the abandoned classroom. Their only clue were the chilling words written on the blackboard: “Find me, save me, or you’re all doomed!
